translation: By the sky and the night comer –
and how do you know what the night comer is?
It is the star of piercing brightness[1] –
footnotes: [1] Whose light pierces through the darkness or through the sky.

arabic_text: إِن كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ لَّمَّا عَلَيۡهَا حَافِظٞ
translation: there is no soul except that there is a watcher over it.
Let man reflect on what he was created from.
He was created from a spurting fluid,
emerging from between the backbone and the ribs[2].
footnotes: [2] Both testes and ovaries are sustained by arteries originating between the backbone and the ribcage.

translation: Indeed, Allah is able to bring him back to life.
On the Day when all secrets will be disclosed[3],
footnotes: [3] The secrets will be examined, disclosing the real intentions and faiths people harbored, distinguishing between righteous and evil therefrom.

arabic_text: فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن قُوَّةٖ وَلَا نَاصِرٖ
translation: he will then have no power, nor any helper.
By the sky and its recurring rain[4],
footnotes: [4] And sun, moon, stars, clouds, heat, etc.

translation: and by the earth that cracks open [with the sprout of plants],
Indeed, this [Qur’an] is a decisive word,
Indeed, they are devising a plan.
I am too devising a plan.
So bear with the disbelievers, and give them respite for a while[5].
footnotes: [5] i.e., Do not be in haste in seeking their punishment and destruction.
